input.sentences: my friends and i went to the beach yesterday .
the guys were acting crazy and i got a picture of them .
the water was cold but felt good because the weather was so hot .
my boyfriend and i needed this time away from work and obligations .
the gorgeous sunset was the best ending to a great day !
output.sentences: Yesterday I made some new friends at the beach.
I had to get a picture of these crazy guys.
The hot weather led us to play in the water.
This guy was fulfilling his obligations as a boyfriend by spending some extra time with his girlfriend.
The day was ended by a gorgeous sunset before we all headed home.
